English: Kill the Golden Aibatt in dungeons and get drop bonuses!
Spanish: ¡Mata al Aibatt Dorado en las mazmorras y consigue bonificaciones!

English: +30% Exp when it's night in game!
Spanish: ¡+30% Exp cuando es de noche en el juego!

English: Sun is here, x1.3 Exp is over...
Spanish: El sol está aquí, x1.3 Exp ha terminado...

English: Complete Eggcellent's Meadow to get Pink Easter Eggs!
Spanish: ¡Completa Prado Eggcellent para obtener Huevo de Pascua Rosa!

English: Destroy the stars in the night sky to obtain star fragments!
Spanish: ¡Destruye las estrellas del cielo nocturno para obtener fragmentos de estrellas!

English: Night has come! The stars are coming out.. Find them in the sky!
Spanish: ¡Ha llegado la noche! Las estrellas están saliendo... ¡Encuéntralas en el cielo!

English: Nighttime has passed, the stars are disappearing.
Spanish: Ha pasado la noche, las estrellas van desapareciendo.

English: Spend fewer Dungeon Coins when taking on missions or entering dungeons!
Spanish: ¡Gasta menos monedas de mazmorra al realizar misiones o entrar en mazmorras!

English: FlyFF Universe is turning 1! A huge thank you to all of our players who made this milestone possible!
Spanish: ¡FlyFF Universe cumple 1 año! ¡Muchísimas gracias a todos los jugadores que hicieron posible este hito!

English: Login each day for 40 minutes and receive rewards!
Spanish: ¡Inicie sesión cada día durante 40 minutos y reciba recompensas!

English: Reach new levels during the event period and receive rewards! Only on the Flyff World Championship server!
Spanish: ¡Alcanza nuevos niveles durante el período del evento y recibe recompensas! ¡Solo en el servidor del Campeonato Mundial Flyff!

English: Exchange FWC Gear at the [FWC Manager] Ava to get more rewards!
Spanish: ¡Intercambia equipo FWC con Ava [Gerente FWC] para obtener más recompensas!

English: The #bFlyff World Championship#nb is a global competition held until September 7th, 2023. Join this server with boosted Exp and Drops and attempt to win exceptional prizes!
Spanish: El #bFlyff Campeonato Mundial#nb es una competencia global que se llevará a cabo hasta el 7 de Septiembre de 2023. ¡Únase a este servidor con Exp y Drops mejorados e intente ganar premios excepcionales!

English: Earn coins by defeating monsters or completing quests for the Gacha Machine NPC and receive exceptional rewards!
Spanish: ¡Gana monedas derrotando monstruos o completando misiones para el NPC Máquina Gacha y recibe recompensas excepcionales!

English: Collect Music Notes and Music Score Scrolls from monsters and exchange them to NPC Bach
Spanish: Recoge notas musicales y pergaminos de partituras musicales de monstruos e intercámbialos con el NPC Bach.

English: Player Survey! Aim for special rewards!
It's been a bumper year, so there are a lot of monsters out to get crops.\nIt's time to hunt them down! Can you help?
Spanish: Ha sido un año excelente, por lo que hay muchos monstruos que buscan cosechas.\n¡Es hora de cazarlos! ¿Puedes ayudar?

English: 1.3 Update Survey! Aim for special rewards!
Exchange letters with a loved one or friend to complete the phrases below!!!
Spanish: ¡¡¡Intercambia cartas con un ser querido o amigo para completar las frases a continuación!!!

English: Let's celebrate for 2nd anniversary of Flyff Universe!
Spanish: Let's celebrate for 2nd anniversary of Flyff Universe!

English: FlyFF Universe is turning 2! A huge thank you to all of our players who made this milestone possible!
Spanish: FlyFF Universe is turning 2! A huge thank you to all of our players who made this milestone possible!

English: Obtain EXP and event items in the dungeon and own a permanent costume!
Spanish: Obtain EXP and event items in the dungeon and own a permanent costume!

English: Complete Daily Quests to earn an opportunity to roll the dice for rewards!
Spanish: Complete Daily Quests to earn an opportunity to roll the dice for rewards!

English: Plunder the treasure from the Pirate Ship!
Spanish: Plunder the treasure from the Pirate Ship!

English: Login each day for 30 minutes and receive rewards!
Spanish: Login each day for 30 minutes and receive rewards!

English: Increase your life gathering mastery gain by 20%!
Spanish: Increase your life gathering mastery gain by 20%!

English: Increase your life production mastery gain by 20%!
Spanish: Increase your life production mastery gain by 20%!

English: Increase your whole life mastery gain by 20%!
Spanish: Increase your whole life mastery gain by 20%!

English: Increase your life gathering speed by 20%!
Spanish: Increase your life gathering speed by 20%!

English: Increase your life production speed by 20%!
Spanish: Increase your life production speed by 20%!

English: Life Gathering Durability Cost Reduction Event!
Spanish: Life Gathering Durability Cost Reduction Event!

English: Reduces by 1 the durability cost when gathering!
Spanish: Reduces by 1 the durability cost when gathering!

English: The wandering merchant's renewal will occur 30 minutes earlier during the event!
Spanish: The wandering merchant's renewal will occur 30 minutes earlier during the event!

English: Increase gathering objects spawn count by 20%!
Spanish: Increase gathering objects spawn count by 20%!

English: The maximum item count in the wandering merchant's shop has been increased by 2 during the event!
Spanish: The maximum item count in the wandering merchant's shop has been increased by 2 during the event!

English: Achieve each upgrade level of 1~10 once during the event to receive rewards. Upon clearing all 10 stages, receive an Ultimate Accessory Selection Box.
Spanish: Achieve each upgrade level of 1~10 once during the event to receive rewards. Upon clearing all 10 stages, receive an Ultimate Accessory Selection Box.

English: Rates are increased, dungeon cooldowns are reduced, and more! Visit the discord for more information.
Spanish: Rates are increased, dungeon cooldowns are reduced, and more! Visit the discord for more information.
